facts.text: I'm the most widespread clownfish in the world! You can find me from the Red Sea all the way to Japan and Australia.
I can live with 10 different types of anemones - more than any other clownfish! I'm not picky about my home.
My tail is usually bright yellow, which helps other fish recognize me as a Clark's clownfish!

profile.diet: Omnivore - algae, zooplankton, and small invertebrates
